name: Workflows Description
content:
Workflow Description


1. Data Profiling:- Explore how our data profiling workflow checks the distribution, spread, and overall profile of raw data using different nodes. Gain a deeper understanding of your data before moving forward.


2. Data Cleaning:- Discover the significance of our data cleaning workflow, identifying null values and applying suitable logic for imputation. Witness how it fixes data types, ensuring a cleaner and more reliable dataset.


3. Exploring Credit Data:- Dive into the heart of our analysis with the exploration of credit data. Uncover insights such as High and Low-Risk Loan Application Percentages, Applicant Percentages by Financial Status, and more. Understand the dynamics that shape credit decisions.


4. Data Preparation and Feature Engineering:- Learn how our workflow calculates credit scores for customers based on different aspects of the data. Witness the creation of a credit rate, paving the way for more informed decision-making.


5. Creating Risk Model Using RF Classifier:- Step into the realm of machine learning as we showcase the creation of a risk model using Spark Random Forest algorithm. Witness the training process that enhances our ability to assess and manage risks effectively.


6. Prediction Risk Using RF Classifier:- Experience the power of prediction as our workflow identifies low-risk and high-risk applicants. Understand how data-driven predictions contribute to smarter decision-making in the credit evaluation process.


7. Predictive Analysis:- Conclude the journey with predictive analysis on the predicted data, providing enhanced data-driven insights. See how these insights contribute to better decision-making and a more informed credit evaluation process.
